long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready for some seriously savage fun with Choppy Orc! Play as a fierce orc warrior on a quest for victory, where youâ€™ll chop, hack, and battle your way through waves of enemies in this action-packed adventure. With intuitive controls, fierce combat mechanics, and tons of upgrades, Choppy Orc is the perfect game for those who love epic battles and endless action!
